title: The Equals
description: The Ones are on the run, but not for long. What happens when your own government turns against you?The Ones are the one percent of the population who were genetically engineered to be faster, smarter—and better. And that makes people afraid. A growing Equality Movement leads to the Ones being forced into camps in an attempt to level the playing field. Desperate to save her boyfriend, James, from this fate, Cody flees into the wild to seek assistance from the New Weathermen, the shadowy rebel group dedicated to equal rights for the Ones at any cost.But as rebel leader Kai brings her deeper into the group, Cody begins to realize that the New Weathermen and its leader have a secret plan more dangerous than she could have imagined—something that could change the course of the Ones’ future.With James’s life hanging in the balance and the government closing in, Cody must decide what is worth losing in the fight for what’s right.
author: Daniel Sweren-Becker
